items.title: Blog Makeover – GHIBLI
items.prompt:
1. Studio Ghibli illustration style
2. Soft, pastel colors
3. Hand-drawn aesthetic

items.title: Blog Makeover – LEGO
items.prompt:
1. LEGO brick construction
2. Bright, primary colors
3. Toy-like simplified forms

items.title: Blog Makeover – CLAYMATION
items.prompt:
1. Clay-like texture
2. Stop-motion aesthetic
3. Slightly imperfect surfaces

items.title: Blog Makeover – LOGO
items.prompt:
1. Clean vector art logo
2. Flat colors
3. Bold geometric shapes

items.title: Blog Makeover – WHIMSICAL
items.prompt:
1. Whimsical storybook illustration
2. Soft pastel palette
3. Playful shapes

items.title: Blog Makeover – SUMI-E
items.prompt:
1. Traditional sumi-e ink wash style
2. Stark contrasts between black and white
3. Balanced composition

items.title: Blog Makeover – MINIMAL CORPORATE
items.prompt:
1. Apple-like minimalism, center composition, extreme white space
2. Helvetica Neue typography, high contrast scale, left-aligned
3. Monochrome palette, single blue accent, soft drop shadows

items.title: Blog Makeover – ISOMETRIC 3D
items.prompt:
1. 30-degree isometric view, clean geometric perspective
2. Purple-orange gradient mesh, dramatic cast shadows
3. Floating geometric shapes, layered composition

items.title: Blog Makeover – PHOTOREALISTIC
items.prompt:
1. Corporate photography, shallow DOF, subject focus
2. Golden hour backlighting, premium material textures
3. Executive boardroom setting, professional atmosphere

items.title: Blog Makeover – GLASSMORPHIC
items.prompt:
1. Frosted glass panels, 80% opacity, vibrant backdrop blur
2. Neon gradient bleeding, translucent layered depth
3. Thin white borders, floating cards, soft shadows

items.title: Blog Makeover – BRUTALIST TECH
items.prompt:
1. Raw concrete texture, harsh black blocks, no curves
2. Monospace terminal font, ASCII elements, stark contrast
3. Yellow accent on charcoal gray, grid layout
